title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Program Using Synchronous Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and basic proficiency in collaborative tools
context.additional_context: Necessity to strengthen workplace relevance for current practitioners and optimize smartphone-based collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Explain the scientific experiment design process with over 80% accuracy through group collaboration activities in teams of three
Submit problem-solving reports based on peer feedback at a 90% submission rate using real-time collaboration tools
Apply scientific communication strategies with over 75% participation in a synchronous collaborative learning environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
